sense.gloss: to ask, to enquire, to inquire
to search, to look for, to look into, to investigate

sdata.j: ↑高校↑↓こうこう↓↑時代↑↓じだい↓について↑最↑↓もっと↓も↑後悔↑↓こうかい↓することを↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓に|↑尋↑↓たず↓ねる|と↑大抵↑↓たいてい↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑決↑↓き↓まってこう↑言↑↓い↓う。↑時間↑↓じかん↓を↑無駄↑↓むだ↓にしすぎていた、と。
sdata.e: When I ask people what they regret most about high school, they nearly all say the same thing: that they wasted so much time.

その↑先生↑↓せんせい↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓らが|↑尋↑↓たず↓ねる|とどんな↑質問↑↓しつもん↓にも↑答↑↓こた↓えてくれる。
sdata.e: The teacher answers every question we ask.

sdata.e: Dare you ask him about the accident?

sdata.e: It is acceptable to mention your job and interests and to ask the other person about his, but be careful not to let the conversation become too personal.

sdata.e: Little children always question things we adults take for granted.
